methods.Synopsis: Grabs information from the A1 data set
Grabs information from the A1 data set for a specific user

parameters.Name: userId
parameters.Description: The userId parameter that is in the URI.

methods.Synopsis: This is a bare-boned implementation of basic OAuth 2 authentication.  We suggest you hook this method up to your login button. Depending on the service, other parameters may be necessary.

parameters.Name: response_type
parameters.Description: code for authentication code, token for implicit

parameters.Name: redirect_uri
parameters.Description: The redirect_uri must match the redirect uri in your app settings on the API website. You must use the localhost/127.0.0.1 url provided for the services tab or else your service won't work, but you are free to use whatever url you want after that.

methods.Synopsis: A function call that requires an access token acquired from first authenticating the service
